title: Thunderbird
content:
Hello, dear volunteer! 

                                   I am experiencing a problem with Thunderbird (Version 128.8.1esr, 64-bit) in that I am unable to use it to send messages.  Regardless of the message length (whether long or short),  I consistently receive back the same error diagnostic, as shown in the image I have uploaded. 
    Could you please help me with this issue? 
     Thank you!                           Armando

N.B.: For the time being, I have no trouble whatsoever in receiving messages.
creator: ArmRen
